description: hardcover book with heavily textured cover; image in black outline and shading of a woman screaming; pages are painted, irregular, and contain text; stored in hard case tied with black ribbons; beige cover with brown image of woman throwing head back in laughter; black blotches and text reading "haa haa"; contains loose card; lender's archive #187
inscription: Inscribed in pencil to William Kosmas on last page in German, with the date 25.10.2002, an inscription apparently signed by artist and Kosmas. Also inscribed in blue pen: Thank you Bill! GMulterer 28.09.2007
medium: Paint, screenprint, graphite, metallic ink, crayon, pen, spray paint, collaged elements, and photo transfer with outer materials of cardboard, felt, resin(?), paper, pigment, ink, wood, leather
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
signed:
Signed and numbered in pencil on last page: GMulterer │ 2002
Signed in pencil (again) on last page: GMulterer
Signed in blue pen on last page: GMulterer
title: Wenn Haare brennen (If Hair Burns)
